title: Missions
body: I have finished the blitzcrank and veigar missions and was wondering if  there are any more missions after those since I have not acquired any more. Now I don't have enough tickets to purchase any more orbs and was wondering how to acquire them.

replies.body: There are a few other missions lines available, but those are included in the Dungeon Pass. By purchasing that, you'll not only unlock the Daily Missions but also the 3 mission groups centered around the new Battle Bosses!
